reviewText: Viewed: 2/11Rate: 82/11: Much funnier than the original, Porky's II: The Next Day is a riotous fun despite its slow start. At first, the film appeared to be weird because, since the premise is the day after, everybody in the cast just suddenly looked a bit older and more different. So, it took a bit while to get used to it, and then, the gang started to have new tricks up their sleeves. The rest was a comedy classic. The last twenty minutes or so were the stuff of legends and geniuses. That was so funny that the movie really topped the original. The funniest part of the film, making for a great irony, was that it looked like it was going to feature a high percentage of female nudity, but it turned out to be quite opposite of that. This gang sure knew how to serve up a delicious dish of revenge. It was so funny in a laugh-out way. I liked how the film took on the issue of racism and corrupted politicians and then spun it around for the best, so we can take pleasure in seeing bigots and old farts taking it in the you-know-what. All in all, Porky's II: The Next Day is a comedy classic.
Title: Porky's 2:Next Day VHS

reviewText: I saw this movie years ago on HBO & just recently bought it on VHS.  Porky's II is actually good, in spite of itself.  Pee-Wee & the gang are back for more adventures & more jokes.  Although I missed Porky himself, I enjoy watching this movie.  I especially enjoy the payback paid to the crooked Reverend Flavel, Commissioner Gebfart, the City Council & the KKK.  Porky's II does have a few slow moments, but nevertheless it is enjoyable to watch to get a few laughs.
Title: Porky's 2:Next Day VHS

reviewText: Porky's 2 starts off the day after the first one ends.At first it's funny then it goes down hill from there.If you must see this movie I'd rent it,instead of buying it.The only reason I own it is because I've got the DVD where it has Porkys/Porky's 2.
summary: nowhere near as good as the original
Title: Porky's 2:Next Day VHS

reviewText: I have seen all the Porky Movies Thanks to Netflix and I have on DVD Porky's 1, I can't believe there is no dvd Of Porky's 2 or Porky's 3, I would have to buy the vhs or the Ultimate Collection(All 3) on Dvd, I give the First one 5 stars, the 2nd 4 stars and the 3rd installment 3 stars. Porky's Movies never disappoint.
Title: Porky's 2:Next Day VHS

reviewText: THE ABSOLUTE WORST OF THE SERIES. THIS TIME, THE GANG HAS TO FIGHT RELIGIOUS FANATICS TO DO A STAGE SHOW. NOW, I ONLY HAVE 1 QUESTION, WHY DIDN'T THEY BRING BACK PORKY?!!!!! WITHOUT HIM, THIS MOVIE WAS A TOTAL DISASTER. THE PLOT IS SENSELESS [WELL, ALL THE PLOTS FOR THE PORKY'S MOVIES WERE STUPID], THEY'RE HARDLY ANY FUNNY SCENES, AND IT'S JUST UNNECESSARY TO EVEN DO THIS SEQUEL. ABSOLOUTELY BORING AND UNFUNNY ON ALL LEVELS.
summary: WHY EVEN MAKE A SEQUEL TO A MOVIE LIKE ''PORKY'S''?
Title: Porky's 2:Next Day VHS
